tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE email_campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    trigger_event VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    template_id INT,
    start_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE triggers (
    trigger_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    trigger_name VARCHAR(50),
    trigger_description TEXT,
    trigger_type VARCHAR(50),
    trigger_condition TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE templates (
    template_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    template_name VARCHAR(50),
    template_content TEXT,
    template_variables JSON
)

CREATE TABLE campaigns (
    campaign_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(50),
    campaign_description TEXT,
    campaign_start_date TIMESTAMP,
    campaign_end_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE subscribers (
    subscriber_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    subscriber_email VARCHAR(50),
    subscriber_name VARCHAR(50),
    subscription_date TIMESTAMP,
    last_interaction_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE triggers (
  trigger_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trigger_description VARCHAR(255),
  trigger_condition VARCHAR(255),
  trigger_action VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE templates (
  template_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  template_name VARCHAR(255),
  template_subject VARCHAR(255),
  template_body TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE campaigns (
  campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
  campaign_start_date DATE,
  campaign_end_date DATE,
  template_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (template_id) REFERENCES templates(template_id)
)

CREATE TABLE subscribers (
  subscriber_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  subscriber_email VARCHAR(255),
  subscriber_name VARCHAR(255),
  subscription_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE campaign_subscriptions (
  subscriber_id INT,
  campaign_id INT,
  subscription_date DATE,
  PRIMARY KEY (subscriber_id, campaign_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (subscriber_id) REFERENCES subscribers(subscriber_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES campaigns(campaign_id)
)
